item.title: android listview 多列显示
item.description: The adapter would inflate the layout for each row in its getView() method and assign the data to the individual views in the row. The adapter is assigned to the ListView via the setAdapter method on the ListView object. Filtering and sorting of the data is handled by the adapter. You need to implement the logic in your custom adapter implementation. 更多参考例子：ht
